errors.card_declined: Your card was declined. Contact your bank or use another card.
errors.circuit_open: Provider temporarily unavailable. Please try another provider.
errors.expired_card: Your card has expired. Please use another card.
errors.min_amount: Minimum amount for card payments is {{amount}} {{currency}}
errors.paypal_instrument_declined: The payment method was declined by PayPal.
errors.paypal_internal_error: PayPal is experiencing problems. Please try again later.
errors.paypal_invalid_request: The request to PayPal is invalid. Please verify the data.
errors.paypal_order_not_approved: You must approve the payment in PayPal before continuing.
errors.paypal_permission_denied: You do not have permission to perform this operation.
errors.paypal_resource_not_found: The PayPal order was not found.
errors.paypal_unavailable: PayPal is not available at this time. Please try again later.
errors.processing_error: There was an error processing your payment. Please try again.
errors.rate_limited: Rate limit reached. Please wait and try again.
errors.stripe_unavailable: Stripe is not available at this time. Please try again later.
errors.unsupported_finalize: This provider does not support finalization from this flow.

messages.bank_verification_required: Your bank requires additional verification. You will be redirected to a secure page to complete authentication.
messages.paypal_redirect_required: You will be redirected to PayPal to approve the payment.
messages.spei_instructions: Make a SPEI transfer with the following data:

ui.action_requires_attention: This type of action requires additional attention.
ui.after_approve_verify: After approving in PayPal, click "Verify status" to confirm the payment.
ui.bank_requires_verification: Your bank requires additional verification to complete this transaction. You will be redirected to a secure page to authenticate the payment.
ui.circuit_open_hint: The provider is in a cooldown window. Please try another provider.
ui.enter_payment_id: Enter the payment ID to see its current status
ui.example_intent_placeholder: e.g. payment ID from your provider
ui.fallback_question: The current provider failed. Would you like to try with another provider?
ui.make_transfer_with_data: Make the transfer with the following data
ui.manual_review_hint: We could not complete the payment automatically. Review it in the provider dashboard.
ui.payment_may_take: Payment may take 1 to 24 hours to reflect
ui.provider_unavailable: is not available at this time.
ui.redirected_to_paypal: You will be redirected to PayPal to approve this payment. Once approved, you will return automatically.
ui.transfer_exact_amount: Transfer the exact amount to avoid rejections
ui.try_another_provider: Would you like to try with another provider?
